CustomField.description: #28069 Mobile App 2nd row not bold 45909 46323 Add Project #
CustomField.formula: TEXT( Status )&" - "& LEFT(Type_Formula__c,20)&" - Project: "& Work_Order__r.Sub_Project__r.Project__r.Name &" - "& Account.Name &" - Foreman: "& WO_Primary_Resource__c & " - Due Date: "& TEXT( MONTH(DATEVALUE(DueDate))) &"/"& TEXT( DAY(DATEVALUE(DueDate))) &"/"&TEXT( YEAR(DATEVALUE(DueDate))) &" - "& LEFT( Subject ,50)
CustomField.label: Mobile App List Line 2
